javadoc:
A handle to a {@link GFileSystem} which allows tracking the current users of the filesystem.

Instances must be {@link #close() closed} when not needed anymore, and should not be shared across threads.

methods.javadoc:
Protected constructor, instances are created by {@link FileSystemRefManager}.
@param fs {@link GFileSystem} this ref points to.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Protected constructor, instances are created by FileSystemRefManager.

methods.javadoc:
Creates a duplicate ref.
@return a new duplicate {@link FileSystemRef}
methods.name: dup

methods.javadoc:
{@link GFileSystem} this ref points to.
@return {@link GFileSystem} this ref points to.
methods.name: getFilesystem

methods.javadoc: Closes this reference, releasing it from the {@link FileSystemRefManager}.
methods.name: close
methods.comment: Closes this reference, releasing it from the FileSystemRefManager.

methods.name: isClosed
methods.comment: Returns true if this ref was #close().

return.comment: boolean true if this ref was closed.

name: FileSystemRef
comment:
A handle to a GFileSystem which allows tracking the current users of the filesystem.
 
 Instances must be #close() when not needed anymore, and should not be
 shared across threads.
